record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, MARCH 19, 2007, AT 2 P.M.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate today, if the Republican leader has nothing further--I understand that is the case--I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 6:31 p.m., adjourned until Monday, March 19, 2007, at 2:00 p.m.
